body.name: Handheld Steam Cleaner, Portable Pressurized Steamer 11-Piece Accessory Set, Perfect for Stain Removal, Curtains, Car Seats, Floor, Window Cleaning…
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Monday, February 19 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
Or fastest delivery Thursday, February 15. Order within 9 hrs 12 mins
features: MULTI - FUNCTIONAL STEAM CLEANER - Our handheld steam cleaner is used for cleaning away the dirty and stains on the floor, car, carpet, windows and clothes. With exclusive technology,high-pressure steam and high-temperature 239℉(115℃), steam shot also can be used for removing dusts. It is an environment-friendly and sanitary product.

11 ACCESSORIES - The powerful versatile steam cleaner set includes 11 pieces accessory: measuring cup, Ironing brush cloth, funnel, two nylon brush, metal brush, bent nozzle, ironing brush, straight nozzle, extension hose and window squeegee. The metal brush will do a better job of cleaning stubborn stains. Accessories can be selected as required.

Chemical Free & Safe - Designed to prevent heating empty boiler, after the water in the boiler tank is heated and evaporated completely, the steam cleaner will automatically disconnect the power supply and thus prevent empty heating. With pure high-pressure water steam used, no chemical agents are added,completely environment-friendly.

QUALITY ASSURANCE - The machine is designed to have aluminum alloy die casting boiler body with extra-thick inner wall, and can resist high pressure and has a long service life. Compete plastic shell is made from quality PP and PA with anti-corrosion and high strength.

USER-FRIENDLY - Switch on power supply, the steamer immediately starts heating process. Steam cleaner features a large water tank of 350ml capacity (recommended load capacity is within 280ml). With the light body(2.76LBS), extra-long power cord(9.84FT) and complete cleaning accessories supplied, the portable steam cleaner can be used freely and widely. Automatic control of heating, able to generate steam continuously and continuous cleaning is convenient.
body.description: SPURGEHOM STEAM CLEANER Steam cleaner for home use gives your home a makeover Multi-purpose steam cleaner with 11 accessories is the comfort of your home.This is a good choice for cleaning.Steam cleaner is widely used for cleaning away the dirty and stains on the floor,car,carpet,windows clothes and so on.No chemical agents are added,completely.It can be used safely.With integrated design of specially-made heating tubes and boiler body, overall heating is provided, high heating effciency and energy-saving. The steamer with bent nozzle can powerfully and deeply clean of toilet edges and crevicesand more that difficult to clean. Steamer for car detailing effectively clean car surface,car seat and car window.Extra-long power cord(9.25FT) can be cleaned freely and conveniently. Steam cleaner for carpet and upholstery,the principle of high temperature and high pressure is designed to efficiently remove all kinds of deep stains and bacteria. Give your family a healthy and comfortable environment. Apply Couch steam cleaner to upholstered surfaces keeping it moving so you do not soak the fabric. Use the fabric steamer tool to clean bed,carpet,as well as smooth the folds on daily clothes surfaces.

Continuous Spraying After connecting the power supply, the steam cleaner will be ready only in 3 minutes with 1050W of power and emits pressurized powerful hot steam for up to 10-15minutes. Safety Cap The safety cap support high pressure.When the steam is high-temperature the safty cap can not be opened to prevent burns. Continuous button Steam can be released continuously without pressing.Press the button and lock to work continuously.This little detail makes cleaning effortless. Multi-function accessory Accessories can be used freely according to needs.The window squeegee can be paired with an ironing brush.Brush and bent nozzle can also be matched on straight nozzle. Continuous Spraying Safety Cap Continuous button Multi-function accessory

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars very nice item, and meet my expectation
reviews.reviewText: I recently acquired the Handheld Steam Cleaner with a 350ml Large Capacity and an impressive 11-Piece Accessory Set, and I'm genuinely pleased with its performance. This little powerhouse has proven to be a versatile addition to my cleaning arsenal.One standout feature is its rapid heating capability. It takes no time at all for the steam cleaner to reach the desired temperature, allowing me to dive into cleaning tasks promptly. Whether it's tackling tough stains, refreshing curtains, giving car seats a new lease on life, or even cleaning windows, this portable pressurized steamer gets the job done efficiently.A surprising and highly effective use I discovered is its prowess in exterminating cockroaches. The intense heat emitted by the steam cleaner is more than sufficient to eliminate these pests on contact, offering a chemical-free solution that aligns with my preference for eco-friendly methods.The 350ml large capacity is a boon, as it allows for extended cleaning sessions without frequent refills. The comprehensive 11-piece accessory set further enhances its versatility, making it suitable for a range of surfaces and cleaning needs.In a nutshell, the Handheld Steam Cleaner has met my expectations. Its swift heating, generous capacity, and adaptable nature, combined with the unexpected but welcome ability to handle pest control, make it an indispensable tool in my household. If you're on the lookout for a reliable and efficient cleaning solution, this steam cleaner is definitely worth considering.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 18, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT PURCHASE...KEEP SCROLLING
reviews.reviewText: I have had this item for a month or so and it has never worked properly. It takes me forever to remove the cap and then once removed, it takes forever to tighten it back on. I honestly kept turning it clockwise for the duration of a movie before it remotely tightened. When cleaning it's not good with cleaning anything. I wish that I could return it, but I held on hoping that it would work if I continued to tinker with it. Stay away from this item and all those from this brand!!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 3, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Advantages:Heat up in a few minutesRemove stains that cleaners won't removePiles of accessories!!Cons:You can't see how much water is left in the containerDistilled water needs to be used, otherwise calcium will accumulateQuality and construction:Well made, rugged, as I expectedEasy to useFeatures:This met my expectations, in terms of ability, but this was mostly used to clean my car and shower/tub. I use it at full steam strength, it's very powerful,Ease of use:No problem - it's easy to fill the tank with distilled water to prevent calcium buildup, flip the switch, and let it heat up. I use it soon cause too hot automatically will make the system safe to use!Features and functions:This machine has a large number of accessories and almost every cleaning you can think of. When changing accessories, multifunctional cleaning helps to clean the home!User experience:Using this machine is easy and lightweight, and my fingers or joints don't get as tired as they used to with other machines. I like that this machine is easy to use.Compared with similar products:The only steam machine I can recommend is the steam machine because it can steam clean things more cleanly!Recommended:I would recommend it to anyone who needs to steam clean floors, kitchens, bathrooms, cars. It's durable!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Everything hooks up and works as it should great products.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 15, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars DO NOT BUY THIS!
reviews.reviewText: I don't review much on Amazon, but felt compelled this time. DO NOT BUY THIS!! I have owned other similar steamers and this is by far the worst. A big sell point for me was the 'Continuous button' which is supposed to keep the trigger pressed, as your hand can quickly tire. But when using this button, the level of steam is 50% less than when you press the trigger hard yourself. They stress not to overfill it, but there is no way to see the water level. You have to just guess from the measuring cup. If you fill it up to start and then use 50% of the water during your project, you have to sit there and hold the trigger until no more steam comes out. It is not quick. My previous steamer had a valve that you could release a little steam pressure before opening the main valve. Like most China made products these days, the instructions were absolutely terrible. To the point that the weird wording and pictures could actually lead to someone getting hurt. And HERE is the best part, I used it 3 times the day it came, and then it just stopped working! I think of the cliches 'You get what you paid for' and 'Caveat Emptor'. I strongly recommend you do so as well and stay away. Hope this helps.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 5, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Average stem cleaner for the price.
reviews.reviewText: This is easy to use, but I was disappointed in both the water capacity and the amount / pressure of steam from this unit. OK for light duty...

reviews.reviewerName: Ni vale la pena, no hace nada de limpieza solo es vapor ni mueve él mugre, sin fuerza el aparato.
reviews.reviewText: No tiene fuerza el aparato y sólo echa vapor sin poder arrastrar él mugre. Innecesario, no vale la pena!
No ensamblaban los accesorios bien, se salía el agua por la base del vaporizador
